name: Flame Dragon King
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, look at all your Life cards and place them back in your Life area in any order.
trigger: [Trigger] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: Add up to 1 card from your hand to the top of your Life cards.

name: Gum-Gum Jet Spear
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 0 Life cards, draw 1 card.
trigger: [Trigger] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: Add up to 1 card from your hand to the top of your Life cards.

name: The Three Brothers' Bond
effect: [Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Sabo], [Portgas.D.Ace], or [Monkey.D.Luffy] with a cost of 5 or less and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
